alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 11:23PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty wind and heavy rain will impact portions of Gila, Coconino and Yavapai Counties through 1145 PM MST... At 1121 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Peeples Valley to 10 miles northeast of Cordes Lakes to Round Valley. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Camp Verde, Prescott Valley, Prescott, Dewey-Humboldt, Star Valley, Mcguireville, Cherry, Geronimo Estates, Strawberry, East Verde Estates, Indian Hill West Prescott, Middle Verde, Peeples Valley, Wilhoit, Bumble Bee, Cordes Lakes, Flowing Springs, Groom Creek Subdivision and Walker. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 252 and 302. State Route 260 between mile markers 210 and 272. State Route 179 between mile markers 299 and 301. State Route 89 between mile markers 278 and 318. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 323. State Route 87 southbound between mile markers 244 and 251. State Route 87 between mile markers 244 and 299. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
